long_description: With a shape geared toward backcountry riding, the K2 Ultra Dream snowboard is built to ride what you crave: deep, light and fluffy pow. Tweekend baseline profile features a flat base between your feet and a rockered tip and tail for effortless float in the pow. BC shaping features a longer tip blend zone for more control; compact sidecut locks a turn at any speed; longer tail blend and shorter tail give you control in tight trees. Directional twin shape provides plenty of overall float and control, offering a balanced ride that's equally versatile ridden regular or switch. WH4 wood core, with generous Honeykomb material between the bindings and rails, provides a fine-tuned response; it's engineered to maintain durability with minimal weight. Bamboo is blended into the core for increased strength and added durability; carbon webs near binding area maximize ollie pop and control. Fiberglass laminated in directional layers adds torsional stiffness, improving edge hold and increasing stability during off-axis landings. ICG 20 support integrates carbon into the fiberglass, reducing overall weight and creating a super-smooth release of power. Sintered Base is an ultrathin, super-conductive base; lightweight with lower material usage, it's the highest quality sintered base offered by K2. .
short_description: With a shape geared toward backcountry riding, the K2 Ultra Dream snowboard is built to ride what you crave: deep, light and fluffy pow.
